articles.title: Baldur’s Gate 3 gets OP Lord of the Rings weapons you need to use - PCGamesN
articles.description: Middle-earth and Lord of the Rings come to Baldur's Gate 3, as a mod gives you the power of both the One Ring and Aragorn's sword in the form of OP items.
articles.content: Finally, Lord of the Rings comes to Baldur’s Gate 3 as you can wield the overpowered Andúril sword used by Aragorn and iconic One Ring in the RPG game. This is a Baldur’s Gate 3 mod for the ages, and… [+2078 chars]

articles.title: China's Huawei says it has reached global patent licensing deal with Xiaomi - Reuters
articles.description: China's Huawei Technologies inked on Wednesday a global patent cross-licensing deal with Xiaomi Inc (1810.HK), according to a statement from Huawei.
articles.content:
BEIJING, Sept 13 (Reuters) - China's Huawei Technologies inked on Wednesday a global patent cross-licensing deal with Xiaomi Inc (1810.HK), according to a statement from Huawei.
